K10bsu032_u:3: Vaidya n = pagination of P.L. Vaidya's edition (added by Klaus Wille)
K10bsu032_u:4: NOTE: Where a page break occurs within a word,
K10bsu032_u:6: shifted to the end of the word in order not to interfere with word search. (
K10bsu032_u:12: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā
K10bsu032_u:15: mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena
K10bsu032_u:16: ca revatena ca śuddhipanthakena ca nandena ca ānandena ca rāhulena ca gavāṃpatinā
K10bsu032_u:17: ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena ca aniruddhena ca /
K10bsu032_u:29: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayati sma - asti śāriputra paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhākṣetrāṇāmatikramya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10bsu032_u:30: tatra amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
K10bsu032_u:31: dharmaṃ ca deśayati tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate?
K10bsu032_u:32: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkham /
K10bsu032_u:34: tena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate // Sukhs_2 //
K10bsu032_u:35: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhirvedikābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ kiṅkiṇījālaiśca samalaṃkṛtā samantato 'nupatikṣiptā citrā darśanīyā caturṇāṃ ratnānām /
K10bsu032_u:37: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_3 //
K10bsu032_u:38: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ - tadyathā
K10bsu032_u:39: suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasya aśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya
K10bsu032_u:42: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samantāccaturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi darśanīyāni caturṇāṃ ratnānām - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya
K10bsu032_u:43: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samantādratnavṛkṣā jātāścitrā darśanīyāḥ saptānāṃ ratnānām
K10bsu032_u:44: - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasyāśmagarbhasya
K10bsu032_u:46: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu santi padmāni jātāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni nīlanidarśanāni /
K10bsu032_u:49: Sukhs, Vaidya 255) avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanirbhāsāni avadātanidarśanāni /
K10bsu032_u:51: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_4 //
K10bsu032_u:52: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni tūryāṇi /
K10bsu032_u:54: tatra ca buddhakṣetre triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇām /
K10bsu032_u:55: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste ekena purobhaktena koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vandanti anyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā /
K10bsu032_u:56: ekaikaṃ ca tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhirabhyavakīrya punarapi tāmeva lokadhātumāgacchanti divāvihārāya /
K10bsu032_u:57: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_5 //
K10bsu032_u:58: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre santi haṃsāḥ krauñcā mayūrāśca /
K10bsu032_u:59: te triṣkṛtvo rātro triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvanti sma,
K10bsu032_u:62: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate,
K10bsu032_u:68: nāmāpi śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti,
K10bsu032_u:70: te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghāstenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayanti /
K10bsu032_u:71: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_6 //
K10bsu032_u:72: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ
K10bsu032_u:73: vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati - tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṅgikasya
K10bsu032_u:74: divyasya tūryasya cāryaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
K10bsu032_u:75: evameva śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati /
K10bsu032_u:76: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati,
K10bsu032_u:79: evarūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_7 //
K10bsu032_u:80: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyurnāmocyate?
K10bsu032_u:81: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāmaparimitamāyuḥpramāṇam /
K10bsu032_u:83: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya // Sukhs_8 //
K10bsu032_u:84: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho nāmocyate?
K10bsu032_u:85: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhā apratihatā sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu /
K10bsu032_u:87: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ pramāṇamākhyātuḥ śuddhānāmarhatām /
K10bsu032_u:88: evaḥrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaḥkṛtaḥ tadbuddhakṣetram // Sukhs_9 //
K10bsu032_u:89: punaraparaṃ śāriputra ye amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapannāḥ śuddhā
K10bsu032_u:90: bodhisattvā avinivartanīyā ekajātipratibaddhāsteṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇa
K10bsu032_u:93: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetre sattvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartavyam /
K10bsu032_u:95: yatra hi nāma tathārūpaiḥ satpuruṣaiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ bhavati /
K10bsu032_u:96: nāvaramātrakeṇa śāriputra kuśalamūlena amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyante /
K10bsu032_u:97: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati,
K10bsu032_u:99: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati,
K10bsu032_u:100: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu032_u:101: tasya kālaṃ kurvataḥ so 'mitāyustathāgataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtaḥ purataḥ sthāsyati /
K10bsu032_u:103: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
K10bsu032_u:104: tasmāttarhi śāriputra idamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāna eva vadāmi - satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kartavyam
K10bsu032_u:105: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi,
K10bsu032_u:106: evameva śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāmerurnāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato mañjudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu032_u:107: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu032_u:108: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_11 //
K10bsu032_u:109: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi candrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho nāma tathāgato mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma tathāgato 'nantavīryo nāma tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu032_u:110: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu032_u:111: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_12 //
K10bsu032_u:112: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'mitaskandho nāma tathāgato 'mitadhvajo
K10bsu032_u:113: nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato mahāratnaketurnāma tathāgataḥ śuddharaśmiprabho nāma tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu032_u:114: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu032_u:115: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_13 //
K10bsu032_u:116: evamuttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato
K10bsu032_u:117: dundubhisvaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgataḥ ādityasaṃbhavo
K10bsu032_u:118: nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu032_u:119: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra uttarāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu032_u:120: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_14 // (
K10bsu032_u:121: Sukhs, Vaidya 257) evamadhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato
K10bsu032_u:122: yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nāma tathāgato dharmadharo nāma tathāgato dharmadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu032_u:123: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra adhastāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu032_u:124: pratīyatha yūiyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_15 //
K10bsu032_u:125: evamupariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo nāma tathāgata indraketudhvajarājo
K10bsu032_u:126: nāma tathāgato gandhottamo nāma tathāgato gandhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskandho
K10bsu032_u:127: nāma tathāgato ratnakusumasaṃpuṣpitagātro nāma tathāgataḥ sālendrarājo nāma tathāgato
K10bsu032_u:128: ratnotpalaśrīrnāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśī nāma tathāgataḥ sumerukalpo nāma tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu032_u:129: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu032_u:130: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam // Sukhs_16 //
K10bsu032_u:131: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho nāmocyate?
K10bsu032_u:132: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti,
K10bsu032_u:133: teṣāṃ va buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K10bsu032_u:136: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām /
K10bsu032_u:137: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti,
K10bsu032_u:142: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhirutpādayitavyaḥ // Sukhs_17 //
K10bsu032_u:143: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayāmi,
K10bsu032_u:144: evameva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā bhagavanta evamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayanti /
K10bsu032_u:146: sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kleśakaṣāye // Sukhs_18 //
K10bsu032_u:147: tanmamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yanmayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
K10bsu032_u:148: sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye
K10bsu032_u:151: āyuṣmān śāriputraste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan // Sukhs_20 //
